name: getAllScreenTabFields
description:
Returns all fields for a screen tab.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:**

 *  *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).
 *  *Administer projects* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) when the project key is specified, providing that the screen is associated with the project through a Screen Scheme and Issue Type Screen Scheme.

tabId.description: The ID of the screen tab.

$ul: **id**: The ID of the screen tab field.
**name**: The name of the screen tab field. Required on create and update. The maximum length is 255 characters.
